items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: This dress is absolutely beautiful. The hunter green color is rich and flattering, and the off-shoulder style gives it such an elegant, feminine look. The black velvety flowers add a luxurious touch that makes the whole dress feel unique and high-end. The quality is amazing and it fits like a dream. I got so many compliments the entire night â€” everyone kept asking where I got it! Truly a show-stopping dress. ðŸ’šðŸ–¤âœ¨ Read more
items.author: Kayla Pfleging

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Blue Floral Maxi Dress
items.body: This dress is very pretty and elegant and perfect for a Fall Wedding. While I am returning it, the reason is that it is too big on me. I ordered the small which is the smallest size but the dress is gorgeous and very comfortable and feels very high quality. It also has stretch so there is room for give if needed. You will not regret ordering this dress. For reference, I am 5'2" and 112 pounds. Read more
items.author: Smiley D

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute in person
items.body: Looks nice on. I bought 2, black and red to see which I liked better. I kept the black. I sized down one size to large to get a snugger fit. Nice sheer arms and off the shoulder look. Doesnâ€™t slip down. Length is to my ankle. Iâ€™m 5â€™3. Donâ€™t recall if thereâ€™s a slit. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little black dress
items.body: Loved this dress. The fabric is nice for the price and looks and feels of quality. The fit is firm and frantic had good support. No support undergarments needed. If you want a body on fit size down Read more
items.author: valerie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress but size down!
items.body: This dress has potential but I would definitely size down. It runs about one size too big. It is very flattering to curvy bodies (I have bigger thighs/chest/stomach). The material is a bit odd and it feels cheap. Like velour texture. The dress has a strong odor that has been difficult to remove. Like a strong plastic like scent. Other than that, this would be a great dress for any date night or formal occasion. Read more
items.author: MoonieReviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a fall wedding
items.body: Wore this dress for a wedding in November! Very flattering and comfortable! I ordered a small, Iâ€™m usually a 4 in jeans so true to size! Read more
items.author: Dylan Allen

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Brown, Lake Blue, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Grey Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
